words.source: H6651 wayyiqtol 3mp Qal of צָבַר 'to pile up, heap up'; KJV 'gathered them together', ESV 'gathered them', NASB 'piled them'
H853 direct object marker + 3mp suff.; KJV 'them', ESV 'them', NASB 'them'
H2563 n.mp chomer 'heap'; KJV 'upon heaps', ESV 'in heaps', NASB 'in heaps'
H2563 n.mp chomer 'heap' (repeated for emphasis); KJV 'upon heaps', ESV 'in heaps', NASB 'in heaps'
H887 wayyiqtol 3fs Qal of בָּאַשׁ 'to stink'; KJV 'stank', ESV 'stank', NASB 'stank'
H776 art. + n.fs ʾerets 'land, earth'; KJV 'the land', ESV 'the land', NASB 'the land'
